faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Salam Institute
faq.stillQuestionsDesc: Our support team is always ready to help you. Get in touch and we'll respond within 24 hours.

general.a1: Salam Institute is an online platform dedicated to teaching Quran, Arabic, and Islamic studies. We connect students with qualified teachers from around the world for personalized, one-on-one lessons via video call.
general.a2: Anyone can join! We welcome students of all ages, from children as young as 5 years old to adults. Whether you are a complete beginner or looking to improve your existing knowledge, we have courses tailored for you.
general.q3: What languages do you teach in?
general.a3: Our primary teaching languages are Arabic, English, and German. Many of our teachers are multilingual and can accommodate students who speak other languages as well.
general.q4: Is there a free trial available?
general.a4: Yes! We offer a free 30-minute trial lesson so you can experience our teaching method and meet your teacher before committing to a subscription.

courses.a1: We offer a wide range of courses including Quran Reading and Memorization, Tajweed (proper pronunciation), Arabic Language (Classical and Modern Standard), Islamic Studies, and specialized courses for children.
courses.a2: Each course follows a structured curriculum designed by Islamic scholars and educators. Courses are divided into levels, and students progress at their own pace with regular assessments to track their development.
courses.q3: Can I take multiple courses at once?
courses.a3: Yes, you can enroll in multiple courses simultaneously. Many students combine Quran reading with Arabic language studies for a more comprehensive learning experience.
courses.a4: Yes, we offer Ijazah certification for students who complete the advanced Quran memorization and recitation programs. Our certified teachers are authorized to grant Ijazah in the Quranic sciences.

pricing.a1: We offer flexible pricing plans: Basic (2 lessons/week at €59/month), Standard (3 lessons/week at €79/month), and Premium (5 lessons/week at €119/month). Each lesson is 30 minutes long.
pricing.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a2: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment system.
pricing.a3: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term commitments. If you cancel, you will continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.
pricing.a4: Yes! We offer special family packages with discounts when multiple family members enroll. Contact our support team for more information about family pricing.

schedule.q1: How do I schedule my lessons?
schedule.a1: You can schedule lessons through your student dashboard. Simply select your preferred date and time from your teacher's available slots. You can book lessons up to 4 weeks in advance.
schedule.a2: Yes, you can reschedule a lesson up to 12 hours before the scheduled time at no extra cost. Changes made within 12 hours may result in the lesson being counted as taken.
schedule.q3: What time zones do you support?
schedule.a3: We support all major time zones worldwide. Our teachers operate 24/7 across different regions to accommodate students globally.

teachers.a1: All our teachers have formal Islamic education backgrounds and are certified in Quranic sciences. They undergo rigorous screening and training before joining our platform.

technical.a1: You can access Salam Institute through your web browser on any device. We also offer mobile apps for iOS and Android for convenient learning on the go.
